China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 18 日，星期日 08:13:54 GMT 120
China's travel spending during Lunar New Year holidays beats pre-COVID levelsTourism revenues in China during the eight-day Lunar New Year holidays that ended on Saturday surged by 47.3% year-on-year thanks to a domestic travel boom, surpassing pre-COVID 2019 levels, official data showed on Sunday. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 07:55:28 GMT LV2QV4TFJJKDXCN4R6LLDHHPEQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-travel-spending-during-lunar-new-year-holidays-beats-pre-covid-levels-2024-02-18/Reuters市场亚洲市场
China's first homegrown airliner makes international debut in SingaporeChina's challenger to Airbus and Boeing's passenger jets, the narrow-body C919 manufactured by the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China (COMAC), has made its first trip outside Chinese territory, staging a fly-by at the Singapore Airshow on Sunday. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 04:49:03 GMT HQY5ITIORNMRXPJYEPWAFH75CY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/chinas-first-homegrown-airliner-makes-international-debut-singapore-2024-02-18/Lisa Barrington商业航空航天与国防
China c.bank leaves key policy rate unchanged under shadow of Federal ReserveChina's central bank left a key policy rate unchanged as expected on Sunday when rolling over maturing medium-term loans, with uncertainties around the timing of an easing by the Federal Reserve limiting Beijing's room to manoeuvre on monetary policy. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 02:22:35 GMT FSMBVHTCABOXZMBJFACADLE54I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-cbank-leaves-key-policy-rate-unchanged-under-shadow-federal-reserve-2024-02-18/Reuters市场宏观问题
China to send coast guard ships as tensions rise over Taiwanese islandsChina's coast guard said on Sunday it will strengthen its law enforcement activities and carry out regular patrols around a small group of Taiwanese-controlled islands off the Chinese coast as tensions rise over the deaths of two Chinese nationals. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 01:15:23 GMT QV2PCIDFWFOZVCT77HIRRHIP5I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-no-banned-areas-around-taiwanese-islands-after-two-killed-2024-02-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukrainian foreign minister discusses peace prospects with China's Wang YiUkrainian Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba said on Saturday he had discussed the prospects for peace in Kyiv's nearly two-year-old war against Russia with his Chinese counterpart, part of a long-running bid to bolster relations with Beijing. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 23:51:56 GMT KRW5FJW7JJN3DPXR4JPKEX2OH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/ukrainian-foreign-minister-discusses-peace-prospects-with-chinese-counterpart-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
China foreign minister warns against decoupling at Munich Security ConferenceChinese foreign minister Wang Yi warned the West that it would be making a historical mistake if it sought to decouple from China in the interests of reducing risk. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 13:11:43 GMT YUT7CHWTOVO2XKLDBB7ES4HZ7E https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-foreign-minister-warns-against-decoupling-munich-security-conference-2024-02-17/Reuters世界中国
China Evergrande's liquidators prepare to sue PwC over audits, FT reportsThe liquidators of property developer China Evergrande are preparing for a potential lawsuit against its auditor PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC), the Financial Times reported on Saturday, citing people with knowledge of the conversations. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 11:33:14 GMT 5RCS3CDB5ZMPHFWI732WRFSQCA https://www.reuters.com/legal/china-ever-greatest-liquidators-prepare-sue-pwc-over-audits-ft-reports-2024-02-17/Reuters合法的
China's Wang Yi tells Blinken US should lift sanctions on Chinese firmsWashington should lift sanctions on Chinese companies and individuals, and that attempts to de-couple from China would only hurt the United States, China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi told U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 03:54:47 GMT KDO75Q3NQBPQXJF22CNIRVPGI https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-wang-yi-held-constructive-talks-with-blinking-munich-chinese-foreign-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
UK's Cameron raises Red Sea, human rights issues with Chinese counterpartBritish Foreign Minister David Cameron met his Chinese counterpart Wang Yi at the Munich Security Conference on Friday, the UK Foreign Office said in a statement. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 00:49:41 GMT NOFFWD7OVVIJHGFST65TBF3PEE https://www.reuters.com/world/uks-cameron-raises-red-sea- human-rights-issues-with-chinese-counterpart-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
Eyeing China, senior US lawmaker vows to back funding for Pacific islandsThe Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee said on Friday he supported funding for U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations as a way to counter the influence of China, and would push to include them in any supplemental security aid bill. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:45:22 GMT LZC6UGA4OZJATBVUSNCCCWXHLI https://www.reuters.com/world/eyeing-china-senior-us-lawmaker-vows-back-funding-pacific-islands-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Italy watchdog forces TikTok to remove 'French scar' challenge videosItaly's communications authority AGCOM on Friday said it had forced social media app TikTok to remove some videos showing young people performing a dangerous practice known as the "French scar". Fri, 16 Feb 2024 17:41:20 GMT X22CYOCKOVNI5JMAR2FSWPKVHA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-watchdog-forces-remove-tiktok-french-scar-challenge-videos-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
